DOC.brief_summary: Register of treatment of unprotected left main coronary artery stenosis in Andalucia (RETRATO).
DOC.brief_title: Register of Treatment of Unprotected Left Main Coronary Artery Stenosis in Andalucía
DOC.criteria: New diagnosed of unprotected left main coronary artery stenosis (lesion ≥50%) Have signed informed consent Participating in other research protocol Inability to follow a monitoring
